interlinear-text.item: I sacrifice myself for my flower 1

phrase.item: You are in Sarsin mountain, golden binoculars in your hand.
When I leave you can see me.
You are wearing a white cloth, what can be my darling's wishes?
A message through me.
You are wearing a beautiful [outfit], there is nothing I can do,
My liver split apart [i.e., my heart broke].
There is a shawl on your head, my darling has a thousand dreams.
At night put me inside your bed.
In front of your house there is a baby pumpkin, don't deceive me my darling.
Call me at least once.
I water the beans, Nuqra came out of the house.
And I kissed her in her face.
I directed the water toward the high water channel, I remembered Nuqra.
My liver split.
You have boots on your feet, a lizard is staring at you.
You are being poked by a stick.
My brother is called Navruz.
"Brodarxon" means brother in the figurative sense, not one's biological brother.
He and I went to get firewood.
The yak pushed the cow.
